fulltext:
LONG LE
who is.
pro-active /dynamic /creative /responsible / ambitious /enthusiastic
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Business
Administration
TAFE University of South
Australia
career objective
An articulate and quick thinking young person who has a natural flare for being able to
communicate and build relationships with clients. Long is creative, innovative and
willing to contribute ideas and professional opinion to any project. He is more than
able to aid client with their promotional efforts, advertising campaigns and digital
initiatives.
ADVANTAGES
Good communication &
writing skill.
Quickly adaptnew
environment working
(internal & external).
Solid knowledge &
thorough understanding
of CRM and DMP system.
Strong digital experience.
Know-well advertising
working process to
control & deliver best
qualified job for client.
Team work skill.
High self-motivated
spirit.
Be able to work under
pressure.
professional experience
SENIOR ACCOUNT MANAGER / Dec. 2014 - Current / Hakuhodo Vietnam

Experience & Achievement:
CRM knowledge of studying client's system status, develop full solution
plan, and execution process.
Experience about media performance and how to enhance sales volumn.
Good understanding about Automotive market and sales process
throughout the customer lifecycle, with the goal of improving customer
service relationships and assisting in customer retention and driving sales
growth.
Good performance in job monitoring and management.
Strategic planning skill with digital experience for successful projects
Thorough understanding of integrated marketing communication.
SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER / May. 2014 - Dec. 2014 /Sofresh JWT - Mirum group

EVENT SUPERVISOR / Oct. 2009 - Dec. 2011 / VIC
